meanings.sent1: I love to eat haricots with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: The haricots in the garden are ready to be picked.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haricots go to school? To become green beans!
meanings.sent4: The haricots danced in the breeze, like little green fairies.
meanings.sent5: The haricots looked so fresh and vibrant, like emerald jewels in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A dish made with green beans.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes a delicious haricots casserole.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a flavorful haricots dish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haricots bring a ladder to the party? To reach new heights of flavor!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the haricots dish filled the room, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The haricots dish was a symphony of colors and flavors on the plate.
